body.name: Little Sleepy Head Bed Bumper for Toddlers | Toddler Bed Rail | Baby Bed Rail with Soft Cover | Foam Safety Rail with Stay-Put Cover | Twin Bed Bumper for Toddlers for Home or RV (1-Pack)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Little Sleepy Head Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 57 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Little Sleepy Head bed bumpers for kids are made of high-quality foam with a soft, zippered cover. Tested for pthalates and lead, this bed guard passes all federal safety standard for bed rails!
The cover is soft and machine washable! Just unzip the back and toss it in! The foam insert is high density and plush at the same time, so your sleeping toddler will rest easy against/near it.
Easy! Installs in just seconds! Simply place under deep, fitted sheets on the edge(s) of the bed & voila! This bed bumper can be used with a full, twin, queen, or king beds.
Space! Allows you to reach, touch, and sit with your little ones without removing noisy, awkward side rails. Allows your little room to breathe and story time much more enjoyable for you both!
Sweet Dreams! Known for our outstanding customer service, Little Sleepy Head offers our 100% satisfaction guarantee, no questions asked.
Many Uses! Whether using at home as a bedrail, as a bed barrier for toddler co sleeping, or on an RV bunk bed - it keeps your little one safely in bed all night long!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we wanted
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for my daughter’s big girl bed. Soft yet sturdy, and has done a great job keeping her in place. We started with a metal/mesh bumper that creaked and what not anytime she moved, and would end up waking her up. The pillow style is much nicer and it actually stays in place under the sheet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must need for toddler beds
reviews.reviewText: This has helped prevent our toddler from rolling out of bed. Easy for him to climb into bed and doesn’t roll off when sleeping! Super easy to install and fits right under the crib sheets. We originally purchased the conversion railing for our crib and it did nothing to prevent him from falling out. We were so worried, and then someone suggested a crib bumper. I never saw one before, and this one was exactly what we needed. This gives us peace of mind at night now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only One in pack
reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy to use and works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for toddler bed
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something that kept her in the bed but not cage like or ugly like a regular bumper. This works perfect and just short enough where I can squeeze it from end to end of the toddler bed. However, if put under a regular toddler sheet, the sheets won’t stay down at the corners. We have one sheet that’s a little looser and works well. Wish I could find more sheets like that but other than that we love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 2 yr old new big girl bed and she hasn’t fallen off yet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 2yr old. We have transitioned her to a toddler bed. She is a crazy sleeper, tossing and turning, so I needed something safe that would keep her in the bed. It’s super easy to clean, the zip off cover slides on and off, and keeps her in the bed. Sometimes she even cuddles it like a body pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We LOVE this bumper. Our baby loves this bumper. I highly recommend this to anyone that has a crib that doesn’t convert to a toddle bed with the rails or for anyone that co-sleeps. We’ll probably still use this when our baby grows and gets an even bigger bed. It’s so convenient. We have had no problems so far and the packaging was not damaged or torn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect soft bed bumper!
reviews.reviewText: My kiddo is pretty good about staying in his own bed but of course at least once a week we end up in the guest bed in his room together. He’s fallen off before even though it’s a queen so this bumper was the perfect solution! I never wanted to try the metal rails because they seem too permanent and difficult to get in the bed but I liked that this one could be climbed over and moved from room to room or stored for travel.It takes less than 1 minute to place under the fitted sheet and it’s so soft yet doesn’t move! It’s a good height so it’s safe but also my son can climb over it (and thinks it’s fun). I wish I would have gotten one of these sooner so I wasn’t doing a middle of the night pillow protection on the bed all the time. Great gift for a baby shower or birthday! Now I’m only wishing I got the 2 pack!
